description: This file defines the OxylabsTools class, a Python module that provides methods for web scraping and search functionalities using the Oxylabs SDK. It includes methods for Google search, Amazon product retrieval, Amazon search, and generic website scraping, with detailed handling of responses and errors.

classes.name: OxylabsTools
classes.description: A class that encapsulates methods for interacting with Oxylabs' web scraping and search services, extending the Toolkit class.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the OxylabsTools instance, setting up credentials and the Oxylabs client, and defining available tools.

methods.name: search_google
methods.description: Performs a Google search via Oxylabs' API and returns formatted search results as a JSON string.

methods.name: get_amazon_product
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about an Amazon product by ASIN, returning the data as a JSON string.

methods.name: search_amazon_products
methods.description: Searches Amazon for products matching a query and returns a list of results as a JSON string.

methods.name: scrape_website
methods.description: Scrapes content from a specified website URL, optionally rendering JavaScript, and returns the content info as a JSON string.

methods.name: _error_response
methods.description: Generates a standardized JSON error message for failed operations.
